title: Modern Gamer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose *n* player(s) at night to **Watch**, 3 at max. (n being the current night)
- The host will explain in Fortnite terms the notifications the player receives as well as any hidden notifications such as an Arsonist Douse.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Framed players will give no feedback.
- Disguised players will give feedback of the player they're disguised as.

desc:
Post 5406
*Guys, is 2,000 hours on Fortnite bad???*
